data.name: XR Designer
data.description:
XR Designer is a VR game that allows you to design and share rooms.
You can visit rooms created by others, or upload your own models and wallpapers for use.

----Functions at a glance ----
Summon models
Change the texture of walls, etc.
Visit other users' rooms
Check your own data
Log in
Switch windows
Change weather
Change background music
Save Room
Load Room
Volume control
Change language

---Controls ----
Move with the left controller stick.
Rotate with the right controller stick.
The upper trigger on the right controller controls the menu panel.

 When you open the menu panel of a model and select a model: 
 You can summon & hold the model with the upper trigger on the right controller.
 Press A on the right controller to zoom in and out.
 Press B on the right controller to rotate the model.
 Delete a model with the lower trigger of the right controller.
 When you move the model while holding the model, the model will move.

(More detailed explanation can be found at "https://xrsns.org/")

---Special thanks---
BGM: (C) K.Y., (C) L-side, (C) Sound Effect Lab
Model: (C) MASAYOSHI, (C) Dimensiva, (C) 3D Shaker
